title: Can someone explain to me what "Zz'rot Juggling" is?
body:
I heard a streamer talk about it.... but I have no idea...

can you buy a zzrot outright, use it's active at the fountain, then unsell it?

or does it mean, buy one, use active, sell it, re-buy 6th item late game..?

idek

if the first option is possible, that'd be pretty broken

edit: this is CTElephant 6 months in the future. watchout, someone necro'd :p
